candidates.title: SDK v0.4.0
candidates.body:
- refactor `EndpointResponse` from `Result<String, Error>` to `Result<ContainerEndpoint, Error>`
- `logger` feature for automatic log / log file setup
- `logger` feature panic handler
- `ErrorExt` trait for working with `Option` / `Result` to `Error` conversion

candidates.title: `run_command` facilitation
candidates.body:
- facilitates the command execution lifecycle. See the doc comments for `RunCommandExt` and the updated service example
- fix: emit output of the start command

candidates.title: Environment trait + tests
candidates.body:
- `Env` and `DefaultEnv` for customizing the environment (directories / command line args)
- `RuntimeMode` moved from `runner` to `runtime` module
- context and configuration tests
- cleanup crate exports
- drop the `main` macro

repo.name: ya-runtime-sdk
repo.description: Rust library for building new computation environments and self-contained runtimes for yagna
